name: Salmon Race - Swim and win!
description:
Go on a journey with the little salmon to the wide, open sea!
Join the little salmon on his adventurous journey to the sea. Try to survive and to not end up as a fish dinner for hungry bears.

The little salmon is embarking on a new adventure and you can help him make his way past many dangerous obstacles.

-          Swim upstream
-          Avoid rocks and tree trunks
-          Pass through various stages of development and become a fully grown salmon
